message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's valued at $120 by you, and I believe it's worth every penny. My initial offer is $100 for the product. Let me know if this works for you!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you being willing to negotiate. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product, given its value to me.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to meet in the middle. My counteroffer is $95 for the product. Let me know if this works for you!
